response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is a special opportunity to own a masterpiece at a premium yet competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 18000}
